measured_by: boundary radius (η) parameter of the Circular Drift Diffusion Model
justification: The article states that testing whether participants are "more cautious" involves examining "whether the boundary radius for a participant is the same or different in the speed versus accuracy conditions."

For the second research question, the authors link "speed of information processing" to "testing whether the drift length satisfies an order constraint," indicating drift length is the measure of processing speed.
